title: Finding the $$x$$ and $$y$$ Intercepts
body: $$y=x^2+7x+6$$: Find the $$y$$ intercept then the $$x$$ intercept. Write the answer as a string: eg. (0,y), (x,0), (x,0). For the $$x$$ intercepts write the smaller $$x$$ intercepts first.
lesson: 10.5 Graphing Quadratic Equations in Two Variables
